title: How to Remove a Credit Card from eBay on PC or Mac

steps.headline: Open eBay in your internet browser.
steps.description: Type https://www.ebay.com into the address bar, and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Click My eBay on the top-right.
steps.description: You can find this button next to the bell icon in the upper-right corner of the page. It will open your account summary. If you're not already signed in, you'll be prompted to sign in here to continue.

steps.headline: Click the Account tab on the My eBay page.
steps.description: You can find this button next to Activity and Messages below the "My eBay: Summary" heading.

steps.headline: Click Personal Information on the left-menu.
steps.description: You'll find a navigation menu on the left-hand side of the Account page. Click this option under the "My Account" heading on the menu.

steps.headline: Find your credit card in the "Financial Information" section.
steps.description: All your saved credit and debit cards are listed here.

steps.headline: Click the Remove button next to the card you want to remove.
steps.description: You can find the Remove button on the right-hand side of the page across the card type and number. This will immediately remove the selected credit card from your account, and permanently delete your card information.

text: Open eBay in your internet browser. Type https://www.ebay.com into the address bar, and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return on your keyboard. Click My eBay on the top-right. You can find this button next to the bell icon in the upper-right corner of the page. It will open your account summary. If you're not already signed in, you'll be prompted to sign in here to continue. Click the Account tab on the My eBay page. You can find this button next to Activity and Messages below the "My eBay: Summary" heading. Click Personal Information on the left-menu. You'll find a navigation menu on the left-hand side of the Account page. Click this option under the "My Account" heading on the menu. Find your credit card in the "Financial Information" section. All your saved credit and debit cards are listed here. Click the Remove button next to the card you want to remove. You can find the Remove button on the right-hand side of the page across the card type and number. This will immediately remove the selected credit card from your account, and permanently delete your card information.
